item.title: Scotland and UK FM Speech Analysis
item.description: Covid Speeches Sentiment Analysis This interactive visualization presents the net sentiment of speeches delivered by the first ministers of UK and Scotland.

item.title: Shiny App Demonstration
item.description: Covid Speeches Senitment Analysis This interactive shiny app analyzes the speeches made by first ministers in Scotland and UK during the Covid Pandemic.
